alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:18AM CST until January 12 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN CRAIGHEAD...NORTHEASTERN POINSETT...MISSISSIPPI AND WEST CENTRAL LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 118 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Caraway, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Blytheville, Osceola, Trumann, Gosnell, Manila, Harrisburg, Lake City, Leachville, Lepanto, Bay, Monette, Caraway, Luxora, Keiser, Dell, Burdette, Greenfield, Little River, and Etowah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
